hanzi-su-wiki:
優

Значения

Добрый, ласковый; превосходить; актёр

Мнемоника

Раб 亻 превосходит хозяина по печали 憂, подыгрывая господину.

Варианты

优
purpleculture_pinyin:
yōu
excellent; superior
отлично; начальство
rtega_mnemonic:
優優RS
优优		superior, excellent, actor
  • person 亻 superior in making people believe he is showing his real emotions 憂: excellent actor
  • ⓢ person 亻 able to make people believe he is a dog 尤: superior actor
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 优)
Antonyms: 劣
Pictophonetic: 憂 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
優秀 [ yōu xiù ]: outstanding; excellent
優勢 [ yōu shì ]: superiority; dominance; advantage
優質 [ yōu zhì ]: excellent quality
優化 [ yōu huà ]: optimization; to optimize; to make superior
優良 [ yōu liáng ]: fine; good; first-rate

koohiiStory1: The A-Team is on a mission to help Hamlet. With uncharacteristic tenderness, Mr. T consoles the melancholy Hamlet. "No, I really DO pity the poor foo. There, there little guy...take my hanky". (Careful: benevolence (#885).
koohiiStory2: Someone can´t be melancholy for long if just one person treats them with a little tenderness.
kunYomi: やさ.しい、すぐ.れる、まさ.る
jp_example_words:
俳優(はいゆう): actor, actress, player, performer
優(やさ): gentle, affectionate
優位(ゆうい): predominance, ascendancy, superiority
優越(ゆうえつ): supremacy, predominance, being superior to
優勢(ゆうせい): superiority, superior power, predominance, preponderance
優先(ゆうせん): preference, priority
優美(ゆうび): grace, refinement, elegance
女優(じょゆう): actress
優れる(すぐれる): surpass, outstrip, excel
優秀(ゆうしゅう): superiority, excellence
優勝(ゆうしょう): overall victory, championship
優しい(やさしい): kind
jp_readingExamples: 優れる (すぐ.れる), 優しい (やさ.しい)
WaniKani_Radicals: ｲ, 百, 冖, 心, 夂
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader of a hundred foreheads in the heart of winter is superior at being gentle. These hundred foreheads are sensitive, especially in the heart of winter, so the leader must be very gentle. Not just any kind of gentle though—the superior kind of gentle that will keep a hundred foreheads following.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: As a leader, you are superior. You’re so gentle to these foreheads. See yourself caring for them in the winter. Feel the chill in the air as you wrap the foreheads in blankets and prepare heating pads for them.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need to be superior because all of these foreheads belong to youths (ゆう). They don't know how to take care of themselves, though they try to convince you they can. They're too young to know any better.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the youths trying to show you that they are the superior ones, then they sneeze, their eyes fill with tears, and you have to gently tuck them back into bed. Silly youths.
Ru_Meaning: tenderness, excel, surpass, actor, superiority, gentleness
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 化 (превращаться), 冖 (ва), 夂 (зима), 心 (сердце), 白 (белый), 自 (сам)
Ru_trainchinese:
yōu: (прил) отличный, превосходный
yōu: (графема) обильный; обходиться по-особенному; (устар.) актриса или актер
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the grieving (憂) man (亻) will excel at being kind
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Excellent' Mr. T says sounding like a mad scientist as he brings to life his frankenpooch dog.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " worry ", the original meaning is sufficient and abundant. "Shu Wen": "Rao Ye. From the people, worry about the sound. One said: Advocate Ye." "Mandarin ‧ Lu Yu": "Today will benefit from the small gift, sacrifice to the individual. The small gift is not salty, but the individual is respectful. Not good. If it is not salty, the people will not return; if it is not good, God will be Fu Fu." Wei Zhao's note: "Excellent, Yu Ye."

" Excellent " can mean excellent and good. "Han Shu-Wang Gong Liang Gong Bao Chuan Zan": "The materials of Wang and Gong are superior to Gong and Bao."

" Excellent " also means lenient and surplus. "Mencius·Gaozi": "Good kindness is better than the world, but how about Lu Guo?"

" Excellent " also means leisure and ease. 30 of Jin Luji's "Yan Lianzhu": "The ministers listened to their ears and asked for the sound, seeing the best and listening to the pain; the heart was clear, the form was easy and the work was divine."

" Excellent " also refers to harmony and coordination. "Huainanzi-Yuan Daoxun": "Its virtue is superior to heaven and earth and yin and yang, and adjusts the five elements during the four seasons." Gao You's note: "Excellent, soft, and harmonious."

" Excellent " also refers to hesitation and lack of decision. "Guan Zi·Xiao Kuang": "The superior is the only thing that is good and the insensitivity is indispensable. The superior will kill the crowd, and the insensitivity will not keep up with things." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Excellent means that you will keep going."

" Excellent " also means preferential treatment and awards. "Han Shu·Che Qianqiu Biography": "In the beginning, Qianqiu is old, and the superior, when you meet in the morning, you have to take a car into the palace.

" Excellent " also refers to artists who perform music and dance, miscellaneous opera, and perform music and dance. "Twenty-eight years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The Chen family and the Bao family are the best. The horses of the Qing family are shocked, and the scholars all release their armour and tie the horse, and drink wine, and observe the excellent." "Question Next": "Today the king is advocating on the left, the right is the best, slandering people in the front, flattering people in the back, how can you catch Huan Gong?"
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " sorrow ", the original meaning is sufficient and abundant.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「憂」聲，本義為充足、豐饒。《說文》：「饒也。从人，憂聲。一曰：倡也。」 《國語‧魯語上》：「今將惠以小賜，祀以獨恭。小賜不咸，獨恭不優。不咸，民不歸也；不優，神弗福也。」韋昭注：「優，裕也。」

　　「優」可表示優良、好。《漢書‧王貢兩龔鮑傳贊》：「王、貢之材，優於龔、鮑。」

　　「優」還表示寬綽、有餘力。《孟子‧告子》：「好善優於天下，而況魯國乎？」

　　「優」也指悠閑、安逸。晉陸機〈演連珠〉之三十：「臣聞傾耳求音，視優聽苦；澄心徇物，形逸神勞。」

　　「優」還指和順、協調。《淮南子‧原道訓》：「其德優天地而和陰陽，節四時而調五行。」高誘注：「優，柔也。和，調也。」

　　「優」亦指猶豫、缺乏決斷。《管子‧小匡》：「人君唯優與不敏為不可。優則亡眾，不敏不及事。」尹知章注：「優，謂逶隨不斷。」

　　「優」還表示優待、嘉獎。《漢書‧車千秋傳》：「初，千秋年老，上優之，朝見，得乘小車入宮殿中。」

　　「優」也指樂舞、雜戲及表演樂舞、雜戲的藝人。《左傳‧襄公二十八年》：「陳氏、鮑氏之圉人為優。慶氏之馬善驚，士皆釋甲束馬，而飲酒，且觀優。」《晏子春秋‧內篇問下》：「今君左為倡，右為優，讒人在前，諛人在後，又焉可逮桓公之後者乎？」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「憂」聲，本義為充足、豐饒。

①美好的，出衆的：優良。優等。
②古代指演劇的人：優伶。俳優(滑稽雜耍藝人)。
③充足，富裕：優裕(富裕，充足)。優厚。優惠。優遇。養尊處優(處於尊貴的地位，過着優裕的生活，用於貶義)。

從「 人 」，「 憂 」聲，本義為充足、豐饒。《說文》：「饒也。从人，憂聲。一曰：倡也。」 《國語‧魯語上》：「今將惠以小賜，祀以獨恭。小賜不咸，獨恭不優。不咸，民不歸也；不優，神弗福也。」韋昭注：「優，裕也。」 「 優 」可表示優良、好。《漢書‧王貢兩龔鮑傳贊》：「王、貢之材，優於龔、鮑。」 「 優 」還表示寬綽、有餘力。《孟子‧告子》：「好善優於天下，而況魯國乎？」 「 優 」也指悠閑、安逸。晉陸機〈演連珠〉之三十：「臣聞傾耳求音，視優聽苦；澄心徇物，形逸神勞。」 「 優 」還指和順、協調。《淮南子‧原道訓》：「其德優天地而和陰陽，節四時而調五行。」高誘注：「優，柔也。和，調也。」 「 優 」亦指猶豫、缺乏決斷。《管子‧小匡》：「人君唯優與不敏為不可。優則亡眾，不敏不及事。」尹知章注：「優，謂逶隨不斷。」 「 優 」還表示優待、嘉獎。《漢書‧車千秋傳》：「初，千秋年老，上優之，朝見，得乘小車入宮殿中。」 「 優 」也指樂舞、雜戲及表演樂舞、雜戲的藝人。《左傳‧襄公二十八年》：「陳氏、鮑氏之圉人為優。慶氏之馬善驚，士皆釋甲束馬，而飲酒，且觀優。」《晏子春秋‧內篇問下》：「今君左為倡，右為優，讒人在前，諛人在後，又焉可逮桓公之後者乎？」

優字的基本解释

優
yōu
见“优”。

優字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōu］
［《廣韻》於求切，平尤，影。］
“优1”的繁体字。
(1)饶，多，博。
(2)引申为优厚，给予好的待遇。
(3)使……丰足。
(4)宽绰，有余力。
(5)悠闲，安逸。
(6)和顺，协调。
(7)宽和；和缓。
(8)犹豫，缺乏决断。
(9)优良；美好；优越。跟“劣”相对。
(10)胜过，比别的好。
(11)优待；嘉奖。
(12)戏谑；娱乐。
(13)古代表演乐舞、杂戏的艺人。宋元以后，亦泛称戏曲艺人、演员。
(14)指乐舞、杂戏。
(15)褒奖，嘉奖。参见“優詔”、“優言”。
(16)见“優頭”。
[②]［ōu］
［《集韻》烏侯切，平侯，影。］
“优2”的繁体字。
见“伊優亞”。

優字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　優； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页120第28
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】於求切【正韻】於尤切，?音憂。【爾雅·釋訓】優優，和也。【詩·商頌】敷政優優。言人君德政和樂也。　又優游，和柔也。【詩·大雅】優游爾休矣。　又【詩·大雅】天之降罔，維其優矣。【傳】渥也。【箋】寬也。　又【說文】饒也。又饒洽也。【詩·小雅】旣優旣渥。又有餘力也。【論語】仕而優則學。　又勝也，對劣之稱。　又【小爾雅】優，多也。　又【正韻】調戲也。【左傳·襄六年】宋華弱與樂轡，少相狎，長相優。　又伊優，屈曲佞媚貌。　又倡優。【前漢·東方朔傳】朔好詼諧，武帝以俳優畜之。又【左傳·襄二十八年】?氏鮑氏之圉人爲優。【正義】優者，戲名也。【晉語】有優施。【史記·滑稽傳】有優孟，優旃，皆善爲優戲，而以優著名。　又姓。　又【集韻】烏侯切，音謳。【前漢·東方朔傳】伊優亞者，辭未定也。亞音鴉。　又通作要，平聲。【禮·深衣】要縫半下。【鄭註】要或爲優。

Traditional characters of "优1".
(1) Rao, Duo, Bo.
(2) The extension is generous and good treatment.
(3) To enrich...
(4) Be generous and have plenty of power.
(5) Leisure and ease.
(6) Harmony and coordination.
(7) Tolerance; Gentle.
(8) Hesitation, lack of decision.
(9) Excellent; beautiful; superior. Contrast with "bad".
(10) To be better than others.
(11) Preferential treatment; awards.
(12) Joking; entertainment.
(13) Entertainers who performed music, dance and miscellaneous shows in ancient times. After the Song and Yuan dynasties, it was also generally called an opera artist and actor.
(14) Refers to music and dance, miscellaneous drama.
(15) Testimonials and awards. See "youzhao", "youyan".
(16) See "Youtou".

Name meaning

yōu
вм. 优
Radicals: ｲ, 百, 冖, 心, 夂  (leader, hundred, forehead, heart, winter)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader of a hundred foreheads in the heart of winter is superior at being gentle. These hundred foreheads are sensitive, especially in the heart of winter, so the leader must be very gentle. Not just any kind of gentle though—the superior kind of gentle that will keep a hundred foreheads following.
As a leader, you are superior. You’re so gentle to these foreheads. See yourself caring for them in the winter. Feel the chill in the air as you wrap the foreheads in blankets and prepare heating pads for them.
Reading Mnemonic
You need to be superior because all of these foreheads belong to youths (ゆう). They don't know how to take care of themselves, though they try to convince you they can. They're too young to know any better.
Picture the youths trying to show you that they are the superior ones, then they sneeze, their eyes fill with tears, and you have to gently tuck them back into bed. Silly youths.
